nodes.documentation:
Underscore Protocol Ethereum Service used to store the content of
_Prtcl perspectives
nodes.name: Uprtcl

nodes.documentation: Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer and the context.
nodes.name: addPerspective

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "only the owner can update the perspective"

arguments.value: only the owner can update the perspective

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only the owner can update the perspective"

nodes.documentation: Changes the owner of a given perspective. Available only to the current owner of that perspective.
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation: Get the perspective owner and details from its ID
nodes.name: getPerspectiveDetails

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addPerspective((bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,.notice: Adds a new perspective to the mapping and sets the owner. The head pointer and the context.

changeOwner(bytes32,address).notice: Changes the owner of a given perspective. Available only to the current owner of that perspective.

getPerspectiveDetails(bytes32).notice: Get the perspective owner and details from its ID

userdoc.notice: Underscore Protocol Ethereum Service used to store the content of _Prtcl perspectives
